pros: A great place for students to learn hard and soft skills that can prepare them for future employment and career development.

review_title: Glad that I worked here before
job_title: Team Member, Outgoing Exchange Program (OGX) in Taipei
pros: Opportunities to work with and learn from the brightest students from different countries and collaborate with corporate partners.
cons: Good time management and initiative needed. Not as relaxing as other student organizations.

review_title: Spend too much time on it
pros: we can certainly learn something from the experience.
cons: It consumed most of my time that I wish I could spend wisely, like finding an internship or a job before graduation.

pros: 1) Got to learn a lot as a student.
cons: 1) Took too much time to manage.
